block.p: $1.25 Million 40 Grace Court 5-family, 5-story brownstone; dining area, eat-in kitchen in two lower floor units; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, marble mantels, parquet floors, original moldings and detail; taxes $8,985. listed at $1.45 million, 13 weeks on market (brokers: Montague Real Estate; William S. Ross Real Estate).

$825,000 94 Park Place 2-family, 4-story brownstone; 3 bedrooms, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in primary duplex; 2 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, dining room in other; fireplace, central air-conditioning, original moldings and detail; taxes $2,174, listed at $825,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Warren Lewis Real Estate).

$1.25 Million 40 Grace Court 5-family, 5-story brownstone; dining area, eat-in kitchen in two lower floor units; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, marble mantels, parquet floors, original moldings and detail; taxes $8,985. listed at $1.45 million, 13 weeks on market (brokers: Montague Real Estate; William S. Ross Real Estate).

$825,000 94 Park Place 2-family, 4-story brownstone; 3 bedrooms, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in primary duplex; 2 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, dining room in other; fireplace, central air-conditioning, original moldings and detail; taxes $2,174, listed at $825,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Warren Lewis Real Estate).

$440,000 303 Greenwich Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,250-sq.-ft. condo in a loft building; 24-hr. doormen, elevator, renovated kitchen, dining area, living room, hardwood floors, walk-in closet, 2 exposures; common charge $537; taxes $3,615, listed at $440,000, 1 week on market (broker: Tabak Real Estate).

$1.65 Million 123 West 69th Street 2-family, 4-story brownstone; 3 baths, large living room in upper duplex; 2 baths in lower; 2 bedrooms; den; eat-in kitchens, each with a fireplace; rear garden; taxes $7,800; listed at $1.7 million, 30 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group).

$785,000 137 East 66th Street 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,800-sq.-ft. pre-World War II duplex co-op; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, windowed, eat-in kitchen, 2 fireplaces, washer/dryer, 4 exposures; maintenance $2,140, 33% tax-deductible, listed at $799,000, 8 weeks on market (broker: Brown Harris Stevens; Clayman Realty Group).

$725,000 1 West 72d Street (Dakota) 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, office, fireplace, hardwood floors, 3 exposures, Central Park view; maintenance $2,695, 49% tax-deductible, listed at $750,000, 3 years on market (brokers: Ashforth Warburg Associates; Bellmarc Realty).

$680,000 225 West 83d Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. post-World War II co-op; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, renovated kitchen with breakfast area, marble baths, oak parquet floors; common charge $908; taxes $8,860, listed at $695,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: F. P. Wohlforth Real Estate).

$720,000 4665 Palisade Avenue 3-bedroom, 3-bath, stone and shingle Tudor; dining room, eat-in kitchen, breakfast nook, den, fireplace, deck, Hudson River view, 1-car garage, 1/4-acre lot; taxes $3,700, listed at $795,000, 1 year on market (broker: Susan E. Goldy Inc.).

$605,000 329 Middlesex Road 4-bedroom, 3-bath, Colonial farmhouse built in 1806 as a schoolhouse; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room with brick fireplace, terrace, perennial gardens, 2.06-acre lot; taxes $6,373, listed at $625,000, 13 weeks on market (brokers: Kelly Associates; William Raveis).

$2.5 Million 616 Indian Field Road 4-bedroom, 4-bath, 19-year-old, vertical cedar-sided New England Colonial; dining room, library, family room, 2 fireplaces, central air-conditioning, deck, 2-car garage, 2-acre lot, including dock on L.I. Sound; taxes $17,193, listed at $2.75 million. 9 weeks on market (broker: David Ogilvy & Associates).
